name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Java Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in delivering high-performance applications within dynamic environments. Proficient in **Java**, with hands-on expertise in **Kotlin** and **Scala** development. Experienced in utilizing cloud platforms such as **GCP** for building robust, scalable applications. Skilled in implementing **Kubernetes** for container orchestration and leveraging monitoring tools like **Grafana**, **Prometheus**, and **NewRelic** to ensure system reliability and performance. Adept in database management using **PostgreSQL** and caching solutions with **Redis**. 

Demonstrated ability in applying development practices such as **TDD**, **DDD**, and CI/CD pipelines to enhance collaboration and code quality. A background in delivering end-to-end solutions that align with industry standards, emphasizing reliability and scalability. Familiarity with frameworks like **Spock**, **SparkJava**, **JOOQ**, and **Flyway** contributes to creating modular and maintainable codebases. Proven track record in building AI/ML-powered platforms, previously steering projects that included predictive analytics and real-time processing.
